name: Way Home (itch) (StephenRockett, Patpig10, Darragh Lynch)
description:
An Augmented reality single-player puzzle game where you must move the blocks around to get your character to the goal with unique cards for each level. You can create a path to the goal using the blocks in the level. 

Disability Friendly - The game design focuses on being as inclusive as possible to all.

  1. This game is designed to be a low-stress environment for all varieties of gamers. 
  2. The game's cards and in-game design were specifically designed with high tonal contrasts (as opposed to hue change) with regard to Tritanopia, Protanopia, and Deuteranopia. Something that was heavily focused on during the ideation stage of the game design.
  3. The game's design focuses on using minimal written instruction and few words of text to prevent any possible hindrances to those who struggle with the legibility of some words (due to dyslexia, vision impairment, and illiteracy).
